hero.event_description: Come to Systemvetardagen, one of the biggest job fairs in Sweden for students and employers in the IT-business!

student_node.intro: This year we have once again partnered up with StudentNode to offer students the opportunity of applying for interview sessions with the companies!
student_node.step3: Fill in all your info for the account and upload your CV. This way you increase your chances of getting your desired job!
student_node.step4: Write and upload personlized cover letters for the companies that you apply for! This will make you stand out and in turn increase your chances!
student_node.step5: Find the companies you are most interested in and select a time of your choosing to apply for an interview session.
student_node.step6: Press ‚ÄúAns√∂k‚Äù to apply for the interview(s) and then press ‚ÄúSend times to my email‚Äù to send the selected times to your email inbox. Don‚Äôt forget to save the times to your calendar!

info.disk_introduction1: For the 27th year in a row, Systemvetardagen is arranged at Stockholm University. It is the
info.disk_introduction2: , from the Department of Data and Systems Science DSV, own job fair day. During the day, valuable contacts are made between students and the business community. Systemvetardagen is a unique meeting place for students & organizations in the IT industry.
info.event_description2: This year's edition of Systemvetardagen will take place in hybrid form. The fair will be digital, in combination with physical events and presentations. On the day of the fair, you will see virtual booths on the fair website where you can interact with the companies and take part of information about the companies and job advertisements that they have uploaded. During the day, live lectures will be held by our sponsors.
info.before_the_fair_description1: Update you CV and have it easily available so that you can give or send it to a company if you get asked for it.
info.before_the_fair_description2: Look through the catalog and make note of which companies you are interested in talking to.
info.before_the_fair_description3: Look into which company events you are interested in.
info.before_the_fair_description4: Now you‚Äôre well prepared for the fair!
info.during_the_fair_description1: Use the fair map to find the companies that you are interested in.
info.during_the_fair_description2: Walk around on the fair floor and talk to the companies. They are there to come into contact with students, so take the opportunity!
info.during_the_fair_description3: Learn something new ‚Äì During the day there will be company events in Aula NOD. Check out the schedule to see which events sound interesting to you!
info.question1: I don‚Äôt attend Stockholm university; can I still participate?
info.question2: Does it cost me anything to participate?
info.answer2: No, it‚Äôs completely free for all students to attend the fair and its events.
info.question3: Can I participate in the fair if I don't speak Swedish?
info.answer3: Absolutely! The website is offered in both Swedish and English, and the participating companies are happy to speak English.
info.question4: Do I need to sign up to attend the fair?
info.answer4: No, you don't need to sign up to attend the fair or to go to the events in Aula NOD!

landing_page.old_cat_description: The catalog is here and now in digital and interactive form! In it you will find everything you need to know about the event, with information about our sponsors, exhibiting companies and much more!

catalog_page.posts-heading: The Project Leaders have the floor!
